snippet: The Brooklyn House of Detention, set to reopen next week, has raised concerns about safety and parking in Boerum Hill.
abstract: Brooklyn House of Detention is set to reopen in Boerum Hill, a neighborhood that has become increasingly upscale since the city jail closed in 2003; residents express concerns about increased foot traffic and crime along with lesser disruptions like parking.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn House of Detention, set to reopen next week, has raised concerns about safety and parking in Boerum Hill.

headline.seo: Reopening of Brooklyn House of Detention Worries Neighbors
headline.main: As Neighborhood Thrives, No Warm Welcome for a Reopened Jail
headline.print_headline: As Neighborhood Thrives, No Warm Welcome for a Reopened Jail
